string.text: Eliminate Mutant Threat in Dark Valley
Mutants have been spotted near this location making the area dangerous. You have been tasked to eliminate the mutant threat within the area. Report back to Olivius after the job is done.

We've been looking for someone with enough balls to clear out mutants in a few places. Stalkers aren't coming around here because they are too afraid. If we don't do something about it we won't have anyone left to 'borrow' any goods from, then we will have to move out of this territory.
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Eliminate Territorial Threat
You have been tasked to eliminate the %s encroaching on Bandit territory. Report back to Olivius after the job is done.
%s are moving into some of our territories. The boss gave me orders to recruit a low life with enough balls to reclaim some of these camps. What do you say? Do you have enough hair on your chest?
Ah, good. Here, take this as payment.
Dark Valley Raiders
Loot at least %s more stalkers.
A few of the guys are looking for a scout to take them out to find some prime targets. We all take an equal cut of the loot at the end. You interested?
Not a bad haul. Here's your cut of the loot.
Hit Man
Olivius has contracted you to run a hit on %s called %s.
There are a few people who have rubbed me the wrong way. I want you to rub them out. What do you say?
Good, you got rid of that asshole! Here is what I promised.
Intercept the Supply Delivery
Olivius has given you the location of a courier delivering valuable supplies. Hijack the shipment and bring it to Olivius.

Listen, I just got a tip that Sidorovich is transferring some inventory to another trader. I want you to intercept the courier and redirect that shipment to me, get what I'm saying? I'll pay you well if you succeed, but don't take too long. If the Zone gets to him before you do then we'll both lose out.
Ah, well done. Here's your cut.
